name: Window Man (LasagaGreen)
description:
The world is under invasion by a swarm of evil aliens, they're destroying the city! But you still have a job to do.

Navigate the side of a buliding, cleaning windows, putting out fires and scaring off aliens in a fast and frantic style, keep it up or you're fired!

This game has been produced for the University of Northampton Hamfest 2022, a Gamejam which lasted 3 and a half days.
The theme was to develop something for the University of Northampton Power Tower, which displays at a 213x1080 resolution.

UoN Power Tower

-Controls-

  • Movement- WASD/Control Stick/Dpad
  • Clean- DPAD/Face Buttons
  • Pause- Escape/Start
  • Snap to top/bottom- Shift+LControl/LT+RT

-Credits-

  • Project Manager: Serena Green- https://jcg5900.wixsite.com/lasagagames
  • Gameplay Programmer: Jack Isle- https://eljacko1.itch.io/
  • Functionality Programmer: Samuel Waite
  • Lead Artist: Ryan Mills- https://www.artstation.com/bunnyboi99
  • Lead Designer: Rhys Whittington- https://wulfslash.wixsite.com/rhyswhittingtondesig
  • VFX artists: Charles Wilson
